title: Loft living is at its finest in this corner unit!
description:
** Presenting #601 at the Old Shoe Factory ** Loft living is at its finest in this corner unit. Get ready to experience the true definition of natural light in this 6th-floor condominium residence with 8 1/2 ft north/northeast-facing windows - perfect for indoor plants! The 14-foot ceilings give this unit a vibe like no other. Feel the history of the city in this open floor plan with industrial style cement columns, original hardwood floors, and exposed brick. The kitchen has all full-size appliances, featuring a new refrigerator, gas stove and dishwasher. Just a few short steps up to the newly-constructed sleeping loft, with a separate laundry/utility area. The bathroom is fully-tiled, with a granite counter and wooden vanity. The Old Shoe Factory is located in the vibrant loft district, steps from the ever-expanding rail park with easy access to the Broad Street Line, the Vine Street Expressway, and the Ben Franklin Bridge. It is also walkable to all points of the city (Northern Liberties, Washington Sq, Chinatown, Olde City, Rittenhouse Square). All of your grocery shopping is just a few short blocks away at Reading Terminal Market and Trader Joe's, plus walk to neighborhood favorites: Wood St. Pizza, Cafe Lift, Prohibition Tap Room, Trestle Inn, Elixr Coffee, El Purepecha, The Cliffs (rock climbing gym), Love City Brewing, Triple Bottom Brewing. Experience the low maintenance and stress-free lifestyle of living in a condo with low monthly fees. Schedule your showing today and see all that this great unit has to offer!

title: Perfectly sized, gorgeous 2 bed, 2 bath condo in Old City!
description:
Perfectly sized, gorgeous 2 bed, 2 bath condo in Old City’s Historic Bank Building. This unit is one of 17 luxury apartments with a doorperson and direct access to the fantastic amenities at the neighboring Renaissance Hotel including the gorgeous pool, fitness and business centers, and discounts on food, beverages, and hotel rooms. Light-filled open concept living and dining space with hardwood floors throughout and a custom-built seating nook. Top-of-the-line kitchen with ample storage space, subzero refrigerator, Mielé appliances, and a long island for great counter space and seating. Both bedrooms have good closet space and their own ensuite bathrooms attached, one with a nice shower/soaking tub and the other with a double vanity and enclosed glass shower. The unit also has a brand-new Samsung front loading washer and dryer. Enjoy living in one of the best neighborhoods in Philadelphia, with history at your doorstep. Easy access to amazing restaurants and attractions including The Bourse Food Hall, Buddakan, Fork, Independence Square, the Liberty Bell, Museum of the American Revolution, and much more. Welcome Home!

title: 1739 seybert st
description: Gorgeous townhome in Francisville. Custom-designed kitchen complete with granite counters, under cabinet lighting, stainless steel appliances, tiled backsplash, Plenty of cabinets, and countertop preparation space with access through sliding doors to a concrete rear space. The third floor reveals a fabulous master suite with walk-in closet, trey ceiling with ambiance rope lighting, a full bath with a stall shower with a frameless glass enclosure. 3rd-floor wet bar is conveniently placed before accessing the full-sized roof deck with built-in speakers and tons of built-in lighting, just the spot to sit back and admire the fantastic view. Additional bonus full finished basement, with full tiled bath, with egress, could easily be a 4th bedroom or used as a home office, exercise room, or entertaining spot.

title: Beautiful Old City 1 Bedroom loft with Modern Appliances
description:
Welcome to this stunning Old City loft, boasting a spacious floor plan of nearly 1500 square feet, with soaring ceilings that lend an air of grandeur and elegance to the space. The loft is situated in a charming historic building, which exudes character and charm, and is conveniently located near all the best shops and restaurants that Old City has to offer.
Step inside and be greeted by an inviting living space that seamlessly blends the best of modern amenities with the vintage character of the building. The loft features sleek and modern appliances, which make cooking and entertaining a breeze, while the refinished hardwood floors lend warmth and a touch of sophistication to the space. With an abundance of natural light streaming in through the windows, the loft feels bright and airy, creating a peaceful and inviting atmosphere.
The building's prime location provides quick and easy access to some of Philadelphia's most popular attractions, such as Penn's Landing, the Market-Frankford Line, and the waterfront, making it the perfect place to call home for anyone who values convenience and accessibility. And for those with furry friends, pets are welcome on a case-by-case basis, making this loft an ideal spot for pet owners looking for a comfortable and stylish place to call home.
Please note that the pictures provided are of a similar unit, so some variations in layout and design may occur. Overall, this beautiful Old City loft is an exceptional place to call home, offering a unique blend of modern amenities and historic charm in a prime location.

Both bathrooms include granite vanities, tiled floors, and upgraded lighting. The rent includes the condo fees, water, 1-car parking, and gym access. Located in desirable Fitler Square and right off the Schuylkill River Trail and Taney Park, this unit is a must-see!
The building charges a one time $600 move in fee which is paid by the tenant.
Listing courtesy of Duffy Real Estate

title: Cozy Third Floor Studio for Aug/Sept at 2017 Spruce Street!
description:
Available August 7th - September 1st!
Call or text Annie at  show contact info
with any questions or to set up a showing!
Requirements
Credit must be in good standing. FICO score and credit history will be reviewed. Monthly income must exceed 3x the rent. No evictions or serious crimes. We only require the security deposit and first month's rent to move in (no last month's rent upfront!) In the event you don't meet the credit or income requirements, cosigners can be considered.
Address: 2017 Spruce Street #3M
This property is professionally managed by AMC Delancey Group.
All of our buildings have the option to come furnished for an additional monthly cost.
Description
This studio is located on the third floor of a walkup/brownstone. It features a cozy living space but a wonderful, fully equipped kitchen. Shared laundry is located in the basement of the building. Great location with easy access to Center City, University City, UPenn, Drexel, Jefferson Hospital, and 30th Street Station. Immersed in a bustling cityscape, a plethora of restaurants, bars, and shops await, inviting you to indulge in its vibrant culture and endless entertainment.
Pet Policy
We are pet friendly! No breed or weight restrictions - just a one-time fee of $250/pet. Water is included in the rent. Only security deposit and first month's rent needed to move in! Credit requirements apply.
Contact Annie to schedule a showing!
Annie Oliver
AMC Delancey

title: Beautiful Fairmount Franksville Home Awaits
description:
Beautiful Fairmount Franksville Home Awaits!! This 3 Bedroom 3 Bath home boasts almost 2000 square feet of functional usable space that will surely impress. Located on a quiet small street, its nicely situated and a few short blocks to all the great spots that one can enjoy being in the city. Modern contemporary finishes and wonderful selected color palate combinations of browns, whites, and grays that stand the test of time. Hardwood flooring throughout, recessed lighting, kitchen quartz counters, marbled bathroom tile, are some of the really great features offered. Two large secondary bedrooms on the second floor great for children, guests, or a flex office space for at home work. Washer dryer on second floor for convenience. Third floor primary bedroom with en suite bathroom. Wet bar kitchenette just outside the room always a major bonus characteristic. Full finished basement with high ceilings - a perfect secondary area where you can be separated from the rest. 360 degree views of the city: relax, enjoy, entertain day or night. Telas Market and Kitchen, Bar Hygge, Urban Saloon, Thirsty Dice are some of the local go to spots. Art Museum, Boat House Row and the Oval are always fantastic right along the Schuylkill river. Tax Abatement through 2027! Don't miss out on this beautiful home and area that has so much to offer. Make some memories!
1721 Erdman St

title: Experience all of Center City's Comforts at River loft Apartments!
description:
Experience all of Center City's Comforts at River loft Apartments. Let our 24-hour front desk attendant receive your guests, your deliveries, dry cleaning, or anything else you may need. Our high-rise apartment building also offers an on-site ATM and controlled access guest parking and garage parking for an additional fee. Relax in your loft-style apartment with 16-foot ceilings, 12-foot windows and stainless steel kitchen appliances. There are high-tech touches throughout Riverloft - tech bars with data and charging ports provide convenient pit stops, plus there is a tech lounge with pod seating, a gas fireplace and a Smart TV. Riverloft has free Wi-Fi in all common areas, and iPads are available for check-out at the tech bar. Work out in our 24-hour Resort-Style Fitness with state-of-the-art equipment featuring personal TVs and iPod jacks. There are also weight machines and free weights for a lower-impact workout. Located steps from Rittenhouse Square surrounded by world class dinning and shopping. Monthly rent amount varies based on move-in date and lease term, and prices subject to change on daily basis.
